Main Script¶

main.py¶

The core module of the Lap Simulator

class lapsim.main.Car(max_speed=90, start_soc=50, end_soc=48, capacity=5, mass=227, rolling_resistance=0.02, drag_coefficient=0.256, cross_area=1.2)¶

A class representing the solar car

best_speed(distance)¶

Return the best speed the car can currently drive at over the given distance. :param distance: A value indicating the distance to calculate the speed with.
